rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception area. Vastu guidelines ensure the main door is in an auspicious direction (typically east or north) for positive energy.
Spacious living area with ample natural light from east-facing windows. Vastu alignment ensures the room is centrally located.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout, placed in a southern part of the apartment for better heat distribution. Includes an adjacent dining area.
Main sleeping area with split-level design to maximize space on a smaller plot, ensuring privacy and quiet atmosphere. Vastu: ideally located in the north for calm energy.
Well-equipped bathroom with adequate ventilation, placed adjacent to bedroom following Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Primary entry point designed for easy access and aligned with Vastu principles.
East-facing windows to invite natural light in the living and bedroom areas.
South facing ventilation windows ensuring airflow and compliance with local building norms.

rooms.description: Entertainment space designed with acoustic considerations and ample seating. Vastu guidelines recommend positioning entertainment spaces in the west for relaxation.
